chapter.title: Errors
chapter.para: This is the list of all the errors I have encountered in the log files after the setup.

section.title: "auxpropfunc error no mechanism available"
section.screen: Apr 27 12:53:51 atlantis postfix/smtpd[11752]: sql_select option missing Apr 27 12:53:51 atlantis postfix/smtpd[11752]: auxpropfunc error no mechanism available Apr 27 12:53:51 atlantis postfix/smtpd[11752]: _sasl_plugin_load failed on sasl_auxprop_plug_init for plugin: sql
section.para: Solution is to uninstall the libsasl2-modules-sql package:

section.title: error (network unreachable) resolving 'www.example.com/A/IN': ::::#53
section.screen: Apr 27 13:22:15 atlantis named[985]: error (network unreachable) resolving 'www.SOME-DOMAIN.com/A/IN': :::#53
section.para: Edit /etc/default/bind9 and add "-4" to the options so BIND9 does not resolve IPV6 (unless you have IPV6 connectivity, but in that case you shouldn't see this message aniway). Your OPTIONS line should look like this: OPTIONS="-u bind -4" .
